timeline.message: Refactor: Add providers and channels to the about info.
fix: Get all the descriptor metadata.
test: Fix the tests to compile and pass.
fix: Update the cache when roles are created or deleted.

timeline.bodyText: Add the provider and channel descriptor information back into the about model like we used to in older versions of Alert.
timeline.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Note this DescriptorMetadata has no operations data contained in it.  So the UI will not display anything based on permissions if these DescriptorMetadata objects are used.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Possibly a future improvement but should we create a getDescriptors() method in DescriptorMetadataActions that only takes in a DescriptorType name?
replies.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: Implemented your suggestion because the getDescriptorsByType is what we currently do for the about page.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: This class contains the contents of the DescriptorController.  This provides methods to create the descriptor metadata to be used in both the about page and the user based descriptor data.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Create all DescriptorMetadata objects regardless of user permission.  This is used by the AboutReader.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: This is the method the DescriptorController uses.  Gets the DescriptorMetadata based on the user's permissions.  This is the same type of code that the controller executed in the past.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Create the metadata for all descriptors with UI Components.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Create the DescriptorMetadata based on the user permissions.  Refactored the code from the controller because we were making an extra method call that we didn't need.  Check the permissions here.  If the user has permissions then create the DescriptorMetadata objects.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Removed code from this class and moved it into DescriptorMetadataActions
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: This is a bug that might need to be patched in older versions.  The cache doesn't get updated when a new role is created.  Therefore this descriptor list for the user in the UI would be empty causing the original issue.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Implement PR suggestion to get by type only.
